attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of supporting our president as well as receiving presidential updates. However, after downloading for about 4 hours, the app requested my location, the ability to send notifications, my phone number, address, my social security number, and so much unnecessary information. This app lowered my battery by 62% JUST in a couple minutes. This app CONSTANTLY asked for money towards the Trump administration and made many racist comments and assumptions towards the Democratic party. As a Republican, this app was unnecessary, asking for ridiculous amounts of money from supporters, shared false information, and even encouraged violent behavior. This app would get 0 stars if it could.
attributes.title: Not at ALL what I expected it to be.
